summary: This is a forwarded email from July 2, 2020, where an Assistant United States Attorney from the Southern District of New York is passing along information about Epstein and Maxwell for the FBI to follow up on. It indicates ongoing investigative coordination between the U.S. Attorney's Office and the FBI.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney Southern District of New York
persons.context: The sender of the email, who is passing along information about Epstein and Maxwell for the FBI to follow up on.

events.title: Information Referral to FBI
events.description: An Assistant United States Attorney forwards information regarding Epstein and Maxwell to the FBI for follow-up.
personsInvolved: Assistant United States Attorney Southern District of New York

keyFacts: On July 2, 2020, an Assistant U.S. Attorney from the SDNY was actively referring information about Epstein and Maxwell to the FBI for follow-up.
The communication indicates ongoing investigative coordination between the U.S. Attorney's Office and the FBI regarding the Epstein case.
The document is a forwarded email, suggesting it is part of a chain of correspondence concerning the investigation.
